key_talking_points: Goal scored by Sam Bennett (FLA), assisted by N. Schmidt (FLA) and E. Rodrigues (FLA). The score is now 5-4 for Florida with 17:53 remaining in the first period.
The goal by Bennett occurred shortly after two blocked shots, showcasing sustained offensive pressure from Florida.
Connor McDavid (EDM) won the ensuing faceoff against Anton Lundell (FLA).
